= TestElib =

The Elib is a library for remote control of e-Puck robot via serial port.
The e-Puck robot can be controlled via bluetooth from you laptop or PC.
The Elib library support programmers with comfort of object oriented programming
of .Net languages and it allows programmers to access all e-Puck's sensors and actuators.
